special_abilities.name: Spellcasting.
descriptions: The mage is a 9th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save DC 14, +6 to hit with spell attacks). The mage has the following wizard spells prepared:
* Cantrips (at will): fire bolt, light, mage hand, prestidigitation
* 1st level (4 slots): detect magic, mage armor, magic missile, shield
* 4th level (3 slots): greater invisibility, ice storm

actions.name: Dagger.
descriptions: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.
